abilities.name: Oracular Visions
abilities.timing: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.description: A sorcerer can temporarily bestow the gift of foresight upon their allies, helping them ward against enemy blows.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Warriors of Chaos unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a dice.
abilities.effect: On a 3+, the target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

battleProfile.regimentOptions: 0-1 Ruinous Champion, 0-1 Monster, Any Warriors of Chaos
